definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Shortly after, Ahmed named Professor Muhamed Ghedi as his new prime minister.
sentences.chinese: 不久之後，艾哈邁德穆罕默德格迪教授命名爲新總理。

sentences.english: Judge Ahmed Refaat was clearly not happy.
sentences.chinese: 艾哈邁德Refaat法官顯然不樂意。

sentences.english: Ahmad was asked about removing the pubic hair with scissors.
sentences.chinese: 艾哈邁德被問到使用剪刀去除陰毛的事。

sentences.english: Ahmed congratulated Premier Wen on the success of his visits.
sentences.chinese: 艾哈邁德祝賀溫家寶訪孟取得圓滿成功。
